front.title: A Proposal for IETF Administrative Restructuring

abstract.t: This document outlines a proposal for an administrative oversight entity for the collection of activities that allow the IETF to carry out its work. The current description of the IETF's work can be found in [2]. The proposal is based on the observations and recommendations outlined in the IAB Advisory Committee report ([1]). The motivation for this proposal is described separately ([3]). These 4 documents must be read together for completeness.
